entry.title: Ukraine Calls for More Arms as It Girds for Heavier Fighting Against Russia in the East
entry.content: At a NATO meeting on Thursday, Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba underscored his country’s need for a sustainable supply of arms to counter Russia’s offensive in the eastern Donbas area.

entry.title: Horrors of Ukraine's Bucha Laid Bare on Yablunska Street
entry.content: Russian soldiers were polite at first, but as their losses mounted they turned on the civilian population.

entry.title: Shanghai, in Lockdown, Struggles to Feed Itself
entry.content: Food shortages in China’s wealthy coastal megacity are sparking anxiety and desperation for residents as delivery delays continue and stores of vegetables and staples dwindle in a citywide Covid-19 lockdown.
